analyzed: aa ru ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin no //
translated: one should give a medicinal paste of Indian berberry, honey, and ghee.

original: byi sha la dang / pu tse shel dang / gla sgang dang / ru rta dang / thang shing dang / dug mo yungs dang / 'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang / mur ba srang phyed dang / bong nga zho gcig dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang 'thungs na /
analyzed: byi sha la dang / pu tse shel dang / gla sgang dang / ru rta dang / thang shing dang / dug mo yungs dang / 'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang / mur ba srang phyed dang / bong nga zho gcig dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang 'thungs na /
translated: If one drinks this powder with just warm water,🔽then chews on some honey, one will conquer ascites,

original: de nas sbrang rtsi bldags na skya rbab dang / rims dang / lus tsha ba dang / lud pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / skran dang / lto sbos pa dang / ma zhu ba rlung dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: de nas sbrang rtsi bldags na skya rbab dang / rims dang / lus tsha ba dang / lud pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / skran dang / lto sbos pa dang / ma zhu ba rlung dang bcas pa dang /
translated: fevers, body heat, phlegm, dyspnea, anorexia, tumors, distended stomachs, indigestion with wind,

original: khrag mkhris rnams las rgyal bar byed do //
analyzed: khrag mkhris rnams las rgyal bar byed do //
translated: and blood and bile disorders.

original: yang na ba sha ka dang / kru trug tres dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pu tse shel dang / tig ta dang / nim pa dang / 'di rnams cham chom brdungs te bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa 'thungs na skya rbab dang /🔽mig ser dang khrag mkhris 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: yang na ba sha ka dang / kru trug tres dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pu tse shel dang / tig ta dang / nim pa dang / 'di rnams cham chom brdungs te bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa 'thungs na skya rbab dang / mig ser dang khrag mkhris 'joms par byed do //
translated: Alternatively, one should grind together vasaka, citraka, the three fruits, purisela, tiktā, and nimba, and add honey to the strained liquid of this decoction. If one drinks this, it will cure jaundice, blood and bile disorders, and edema.

original: yang na tsha ba gsum dang / tsi tra ka dang / byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ga dur dang / 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma spyi dang mnyam pa'i lcags nag po'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te /
analyzed: yang na tsha ba gsum dang / tsi tra ka dang / byi dang ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ga dur dang / 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma spyi dang mnyam pa'i lcags nag po'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te /
translated: Alternatively, one should grind together the three hot medicines, citraka, bījapūra, the three fruits, and gaur, and mix this powder with iron filings equal in quantity to the powder, as well as ghee and honey.

original: dar ba 'am chu dron po dang 'o ma dang bcas par 'thungs na /
analyzed: dar ba 'am chu dron po dang 'o ma dang bcas par 'thungs na /
translated: If one drinks this with warm water, milk, and curd,

original: mig ser dang / skya rbab dang / snying nad dang / mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
analyzed: mig ser dang / skya rbab dang / snying nad dang / mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
translated: it will cure jaundice, edema, heart disease, leprosy, hemorrhoids, and all urinary disorders.

original: dong gra dang / lcags phye dang / til dang / bu ram 'di rnams cha mnyam pa dang / sman sna gcig gi nyis 'gyur gyi pi pi ling dang / de rnams ri lur byas pa zos na skya rbab la phan no //
analyzed: dong gra dang / lcags phye dang / til dang / bu ram 'di rnams cha mnyam pa dang / sman sna gcig gi nyis 'gyur gyi pi pi ling dang / de rnams ri lur byas pa zos na skya rbab la phan no //
translated: Take equal parts of iron filings, sesame, molasses, and one of the above medicines, double the amount of long pepper, and make them into pills. This is beneficial for ascites.

original: yang na ta bya dang / skyer pa'i shun pa dang / dbyi mo dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / thang shing dang / tsha ba gsum la sogs pa sbyor ba gong ma'i @249b sman dang / de rnams spyi'i nyis 'gyur gyi lcags phye dang phye mar byas la sman re re'i brgyad 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang /
analyzed: yang na ta bya dang / skyer pa'i shun pa dang / dbyi mo dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / thang shing dang / tsha ba gsum la sogs pa sbyor ba gong ma'i @249b sman dang / de rnams spyi'i nyis 'gyur gyi lcags phye dang phye mar byas la sman re re'i brgyad 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang /
translated: Alternatively, make a powder of the bark of ta jya, skyer pa, ivy, long pepper root, juniper, and the three hot medicines, double the amount of iron filings, and grind them into a powder. Add urine equal to eight times the total amount of medicine,

original: sman sna so sor bskol la ri lur byar 'dod pa tsam gyi skan ter gyur pa dang gcig tu bsres te ri lur byas pa ni lcags phye'i ri lu zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sman sna so sor bskol la ri lur byar 'dod pa tsam gyi skan ter gyur pa dang gcig tu bsres te ri lur byas pa ni lcags phye'i ri lu zhes bya ste /
translated: boil each of the individual medicines, and mix them together when they have cooled to the temperature of a ferment. This is called the iron filings pill.

original: de las ci ran dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na skya rbab kyi nad rnams la srog sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: de las ci ran dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na skya rbab kyi nad rnams la srog sbyin par byed do //
translated: Take it as much as needed, and drink it with curd. It will save the life of those with ascites.

original: gzhan yang mdze dang / ma zhu ba dang / skrang ba dang / brla rengs pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / mig ser dang / gcin nad dang mtsher pa'i nad rnams kyang zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang mdze dang / ma zhu ba dang / skrang ba dang / brla rengs pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / mig ser dang / gcin nad dang mtsher pa'i nad rnams kyang zhi bar byed do //
translated: Furthermore, it will pacify leprosy, indigestion, swelling, lameness, anorexia, hemorrhoids, jaundice, urinary disorders, and spleen disorders.

original: yang na ta bya dang / brag zhun dang / dngul dang / lcags kyi dri ma dang / de rnams srang lnga dang / tsi tra ka dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / byi dang ga dang / de rnams srang re re dang /
analyzed: yang na ta bya dang / brag zhun dang / dngul dang / lcags kyi dri ma dang / de rnams srang lnga dang / tsi tra ka dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / byi dang ga dang / de rnams srang re re dang /
translated: Alternatively, take five sarshapa, rock salt, silver, and iron filings, one sarshapa each of citraka, the three myrobalan fruits, the three hot medicines, and bishana,

original: sha kha ra srang brgyad dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na /
analyzed: sha kha ra srang brgyad dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na /
translated: and eight sarshapa of sugar. Mix the powders with honey and eat.

original: skya rbab dang / dug dang / lud pa dang / gcong chen po dang / rims mi bzad pa dang / mdze dang / ma zhu ba dang / gcin nad dang / skrang ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams la phan te /
analyzed: skya rbab dang / dug dang / lud pa dang / gcong chen po dang / rims mi bzad pa dang / mdze dang / ma zhu ba dang / gcin nad dang / skrang ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams la phan te /
translated: This will benefit ascites, poisoning, phlegm, chronic pulmonary congestion, contagious fever, leprosy, indigestion, urinary disorders, swelling, dyspnea, and anorexia.

original: khyad par du brjed byed kyi nad dang / mig ser dang / gzhang 'brum rnams 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: khyad par du brjed byed kyi nad dang / mig ser dang / gzhang 'brum rnams 'joms par byed do //
